      已过时。 
      Since 2.0.0. Will be removed in 3.0.0. Use Table.checkAndMutate(byte[], byte[])

      Since 2.0.0. Will be removed in 3.0.0. Use Table.checkAndMutate(byte[], byte[])

      Performs multiple mutations atomically on a single row.
